game.title: Steredenn
game.description: STEREDENN is a frenetic and chaotic space shooter, carved in big beautiful pixels with insane boss battles. Embark in your ship and engage the fight against dreadful space pirates in a never-ending combat for your survival. The game is fast, addictive, hard and action-packed.
game.history:
STEREDENN is at the crossroads between a shmup and a roguelike. The gameplay is infinite and unforgiving. The levels are (almost)-randomly generated, with a lot of different and completely unpredictable events (asteroid fields, laser rains, meteor showers, an old battlefield, labyrinths of lasers, etc.). And each time you defeat a boss, you can upgrade your ship to unlock new powers and abilities.
Grab your guns and go kick those big-badass-bosses you'll definitely encounter. Good luck.

features.feature: LOTS of weapons. Driller, ultralaser, giant saw, robots, hypergun? We got you covered.
Improve your ship and unlock new powers and abilities with more than 25 upgrades.
Unlock a boss by defeating it in the normal mode. Then, train against it in a 1 to 1 duel. Your guns, your laws, your fight. Arena.
Try to pass all the hard hand-made Challenges.
Compete against the world in the Superplay mode where there's no random.
SCORING: beat your friends and be the best!

quote.description: It’s pure space shooter pixel art.
quote.name: James Cunningham

quote.description: Steredenn is an addicting early-access shmup with gorgeous retro environments and fast-paced never-ending combat set to fun, high energy music that will have you wanting to “try one more time” over and over again!
